channel.title: Need Help With Npcs
channel.description:
I'm using a Project Czar source, and I want to know how to make it so that npc's will attack you if you attack them. Right now, if you attack something, it just stands there, unless you use a special attack, or click on it twice, then it will hit you once. Can anyone help me fix this? :)
EDIT:ergg...anyone? :(

item.title: Need Help With Npcs
item.dc:creator: @Patrick_M_25 Patrick M 25
item.description:
@Patrick_M_25 wrote:

I’m using a Project Czar source, and I want to know how to make it so that npc’s will attack you if you attack them. Right now, if you attack something, it just stands there, unless you use a special attack, or click on it twice, then it will hit you once. Can anyone help me fix this?

EDIT:ergg…anyone?

Read full topic
